name: AK-74 magazine
description: A standard magazine made for the AK-74 rifle, made of steel-reinforced polymer.  Holds 30 rounds.

name: AK-74 extended magazine
description: A 45-round magazine compatible with the AK-74 rifle, though originally designed for the RPK-74 light machine gun.

name: Beretta 92 extended magazine
description: A 30-round extended magazine compatible with both the Beretta 92 handgun as well as some modern carbines.

name: Beretta 92 magazine
description: A military issue 15-round box magazine originally intended for use with the Beretta 92 handgun.
